overview.title: NAK
overview.subtitle: a construction company that has established itself as a reliable developer in the Kazakh market

about.title: About Us
about.description: "Nur Astana Kurylys" LLP was founded in 2006 and provides services in the field of construction, residential and commercial properties, business centers, educational facilities, socially and culturally significant facilities, major and current repairs, increasing its professionalism and quality of construction every year.

features.title: Our Advantages

experience.title: Experience and reliability
experience.description: More than 15 years of successful work in the construction market of Kazakhstan with an impeccable reputation and hundreds of implemented projects.

technology.title: Modern technologies
technology.description: Application of innovative construction technologies and materials that meet world standards of quality and environmental safety.

approach.title: Comprehensive approach
approach.description: From design to commissioning of facilities - a full cycle of work performed by qualified specialists of our company.

features.buildingAlt: Modern building constructed by our company

housing.title: Housing Construction
housing.description: Construction of modern residential complexes with comfortable infrastructure that meet all safety and quality requirements.

commercial.title: Commercial Real Estate
commercial.description: Development and implementation of business center projects, shopping complexes and other commercial facilities, taking into account business needs.

social.title: Social Facilities
social.description: Construction of schools, hospitals, kindergartens and other socially significant facilities contributing to the development of urban infrastructure.

infrastructure.title: Infrastructure Projects
infrastructure.description: Implementation of large-scale infrastructure projects, including roads, bridges and engineering communications for creating a comfortable urban environment.

hero.title: Business Center Rental
hero.subtitle: Modern office spaces for your business in the most prestigious locations in the city. We offer flexible rental terms and first-class service.

portfolio.title: Project Portfolio
portfolio.subtitle: Our iconic real estate properties demonstrating quality and innovation in every project
